about_the_game:
Warning! Don’t buy this DLC if you have already purchased the “Raubritter” DLC because the last one includes all the content from the “Black Knight” and “Banneret” DLC.


Buy this DLC to unlock exclusive in-game content of the “Banneret” edition and continue your personal journey!

This DLC includes:

  • !!! All content of “Commoner” DLC
  • !!! All content of “Knight” DLC
  • !!! All content of “Black Knight” DLC
  • 1 additional character slot (2 overall);
  • A unique social title and character card design: “Banneret”;
  • Exclusive Banneret’s Cloak;
  • Exclusive social animations of the “Actor”;
  • 20 additional Rog Points (60 overall. Consumable, you can buy 6 unique skins (weapon and armor) to choose from 24 options);
  • Unique T1 mount skin *
  • Unique T1 guild cloak emblems *

* This content will be available as it is added to the game

content_descriptors.notes: This Game content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.

Buy this DLC to unlock exclusive in-game content of the “Banneret” edition and continue your personal journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: Continue your journey with this pack unlocking additional exclusive in-game content!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
